column1: 1,面向黄斑疾病的多模态图像引导眼底内界膜剥离方法研究(Research on multimodal image-guided fundus inner limiting membrane peeling method for macular diseases),国家自然科学基金-青年项目 (National Natural Science Foundation of China-Young Scientist Fund),2022.01-2024.12,Project Investigator
2,多模态图像引导下的黄斑前膜精准剥除导航研究(Precise peeling and navigation of epiretinal membrane guided by multimodal images),广东省自然科学基金-面上项目,2021.01-2023.12, Project Investigator
3,基于眼底三维模型的视网膜血管注射引导方法研究(Research on retinal vessel injection method guided by 3-dimensional retinal modal),深圳市稳定支持-面上项目,2022.10-2024.12,Project Investigator
4,基于实时OCT的激光治疗能量自适应调节系统研究(Research on adaptive adjustment system of laser therapy energy based on real-time OCT),宁波市自然科学基金,Completed,Project Investigator
5,可携式近红外自发荧光眼底图像采集系统(Portable near-infrared autofluorescence fundus image acquisition system),宁波市公益性计划-面上项目,Completed, Project Investigator
6,可携式多模态眼底图像采集系统(Portable Multimodal Fundus Image Acquisition System),浙江省自然科学基金-青年项目,Completed,Project Investigator
